Text.Page:
You think unicorns and imps will make themselves better? Ha!

The mist falls on all the fey and makes everyone sick. Now forestcrown unicorns and caprin imps exposed to too much mist turn against us.

Have the arcanists found a way to extract the mist out of them? No. Ha! I know the wayâ€”the way of weapons.

We must stop them before they turn into argon puppets like the tuwangis.
Do you think the arcanists will thank us for getting all this infection collected for them?

Are you too weak to deal with the forestcrown unicorns and caprin imps?

Then recruit some friends to help!
